CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Application Submitted stage positioned above or below the Phone Screen stage?
SRP.A: The Application Submitted stage is positioned {above} the Phone Screen stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage HR Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage HR Interview is {46%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Phone Screen?
VE.A: The value of stage Phone Screen is {65%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Technical Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage Technical Interview is {37%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Application Submitted, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Offer Extended, with a value of {31%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended is {6%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Phone Screen to stage HR Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Phone Screen to stage HR Interview is {19%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Application Submitted to stage Phone Screen?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Application Submitted to stage Phone Screen is {35%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 82%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 41%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Technical Interview} stage has {37%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {31%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 34% and 82%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Phone Screen} stage has {65%}, the {HR Interview} stage has {46%}, the {Technical Interview} stage has {37%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview, or from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Phone Screen} to {HR Interview} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview, from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview, or from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Phone Screen} to stage {HR Interview} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Application Submitted} and {Phone Screen} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Technical Interview} and {Offer Extended} stages.
